00035 typedef void (*flm_StreamReadHandler)                   \
00036 (flm_Stream * stream, void * state, flm_Buffer * buffer);
00037

00039 (flm_Stream * stream, void * state, size_t size);

00042 (flm_Stream * stream, void * state);
00043

00045 (flm_Stream * stream, void * state, int error);
